item.title: Lamppost light not working, 17th February
item.description:
The lamppost light between 39 and 41 Royal Oak Road hasn't been working since Christmas last year. It's dangerous for people walking outside late night. Also, suspicious people were seen around the neighborhood. This should be urgently fixed for neighborhood safety.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Oak Road, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bikes left in car parking bays, 17th February
item.description:
Not the first time this has happened. Parking spaces for cars have been limited for electric cars and like bikes but they are still being left in car park bays. If I was strong enough to move these i would but unfortunately they're heavy. STAMFORD ROAD DALSON HACKNEY. CONSTANTLY.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Stamford Road, Dalston, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
